actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States limiting the number of terms Senators and Representatives may serve.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that no person who is a Senator for three complete terms of six years each may thereafter be a Senator. Limits to ten the number of two year terms which a Representative may serve.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States limiting the number of terms Senators and Representatives may serve.
